name: spotify_control
description: Control Spotify playback and manage playlists. Can search for music, play tracks/albums/playlists, control playback (pause, next, previous), get currently playing track, create playlists, add tracks to playlists, and hijack the playback queue by adding tracks to it!

action.description:
Action to perform:
- search: Search for tracks, artists, albums, or playlists
- play: Play a specific track, album, artist, or playlist
- pause: Pause current playback
- next: Skip to next track
- previous: Skip to previous track
- now_playing: Get currently playing track info
- create_playlist: Create a new playlist
- add_to_playlist: Add tracks to an existing playlist
- add_to_queue: Add a track to the current playback queue (hijack mode!)
- my_playlists: List user's playlists

query.description: Search query (required for 'search' action). Example: 'bohemian rhapsody', 'queen', 'dark side of the moon'

spotify_id.description: Spotify ID of content to play or playlist to modify. Required for 'play' and 'add_to_playlist' actions. Get IDs from search results.

content_type.description: Type of content for search or play actions. Defaults to 'track'.

playlist_name.description: Name for new playlist (required for 'create_playlist' action)

playlist_description.description: Description for new playlist (optional for 'create_playlist' action)

track_ids.description: Comma-separated list of Spotify track IDs to add to playlist (required for 'add_to_playlist' action). Example: '3n3Ppam7vgaVa1iaRUc9Lp,7ouMYWpwJ422jRcDASZB7P'

limit.description: Maximum number of results for search or list actions (1-50). Defaults to 10 for search, 20 for playlists.
